summary: This content is a series of blog posts on the iTabMenu website. The first post is about the release of version 1 of the product and encourages users to sign up and get started. The second post discusses the automated guest reservation system and how it can help with scheduling guests on busy days. The third post talks about the demand for point of sale integration and how it can improve the guest experience. The last post is about how iTabMenu can enhance the dining experience.
